casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cerron Thomas HOOKS. No. 89A00-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 29, 2005. Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Jonathan L. Megerian, Asheboro, for Cerron Thomas Hooks. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File State's Response:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 1st day of October 2005 to file his/her response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of August 2005."
